unnormalised: ## Chai and Scandal: Bollywood Buzz That's Spicier Than Biryani!
normalised: ## Chai and Scandal: Bollywood Buzz That's Spicier Than Biryani!

unnormalised: Hey you gossip-loving aunties and uncles! Grab your chai because the Bollywood masala is brewing HOT this week. First off, can we TALK about Ranbir Kapoor and Alia Bhatt? Apparently, sources say they're planning a MASSIVE Onam celebration at their Bandra bungalow. Is this their way of subtly announcing they're trying for baby No. 2? The rumour mills are spinning faster than a dhobi's washing machine!

Apparently, sources say they're planning a massive Onam celebration at their Bandra bungalow. Is this their way of subtly announcing they're trying for baby number two? The rumour mills are spinning faster than a dhobi's washing machine!

unnormalised: Then there's the ongoing drama with Deepika Padukone and Ranveer Singh. Paparazzi spotted them looking…tense…at the Mumbai airport last Tuesday. Some are saying there's trouble in paradise. Others think Ranveer was just hangry because he hadn't had his daily dose of butter chicken! Honestly, who knows? It's all just speculation, but that's half the fun, right?

It's all just speculation, but that's half the fun, right?

unnormalised: And speaking of fun, have you seen the photos of Priyanka Chopra and Nick Jonas attending Isha Ambani’s party? Priyanka looked absolutely stunning in that Manish Malhotra saree! Talk about slaying! Sources are whispering that Nick was overheard discussing a potential Bollywood collaboration with Karan Johar. Could we be seeing him on screen dancing to a Bollywood beat soon? Imagine the chaos!

unnormalised: Adding fuel to the fire: Someone spotted Katrina Kaif and Vicky Kaushal dining at a fancy restaurant in Juhu. Witnesses claim there was NO PDA, but their body language was…interesting. Are they trying to keep things under wraps? Maybe they're just enjoying a quiet night out after Vicky's grueling schedule filming in Kerala. Either way, we're keeping a close eye on this one!

unnormalised: Lastly, word on the street is that Ananya Panday and Aditya Roy Kapur are *still* going strong. They were seen leaving a movie theatre in Versova late last night. No comment from either party, but actions speak louder than words, am I right?

unnormalised: So, there you have it – the latest dish served piping hot! What are your thoughts? Let me know in the comments! And don't forget to come back next week for more Bollywood gossip! Until then, keep the chai brewing and the rumours flowing!
